programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Bid Strong and Prosper: Dan Dotson returns to the auctions in Costa Mesa, California, where the buyers have their sights set on Dave Hester on his home turf. (S7, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Emperor of El Monte: Buyers Darrell, Brandon, Jarrod, Brandi and Ivy head to El Monte, California where they tackle the local competition head on. (S7, ep 9)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mistress Of The Snark: Ivy thinks he's a comedian, but the gizmo in his locker is no joke. Brandi and Jarrod make sure that what they find in their unit doesn't stay there. (S12, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Drama In The LBC: North Long Beach doesn't really bring out the best in the buyers, though they do manage to make a charitable contribution. (S12, ep 8)

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend Of...
programme.desc: ...The Superstition Mountains. The Climb: A cryptic clue weaves an even bigger mystery as the team head into darkness in pursuit of their $200,000 payday. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: Winds Of Hell: A storm shakes the island, leaving the men battling to protect their shelters and close to cracking. One contestant takes to the choppy sea in search of food. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Not So Pretty In Pink: The workshop gets to work building a brave father a quirky hot rod wheelchair. Plus, Danny finds himself in fix when a project doesn't go to plan. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: Bigfoot Files
programme.desc: Yeti: Oxford professor Bryan Sykes and presenter Mark Evans head out - armed with cutting-edge technology - to try and answer, once and for all, the great mystery of Bigfoot. (1 of 3)

programme.title: Alaska: Mysteries Unsolved
programme.desc: Vanished in a Vortex: In 1950, a military transport plane vanished in the Alaska Triangle with 44 people on board. Could a space-time vortex be the reason why? (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: Cask and You Shall Receive: Excitement grows when the team discovers evidence of wooden casks on the mysterious stone roadway. (S8, ep 15)

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld
programme.desc: Catacombs Of Death (Paris): Crypts, ancient waterfronts, waste-filled sewers, and hundreds of miles of limestone tunnels snake beneath Paris. Eric Geller examines its underworld. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Outer Banks
programme.desc: New. The Karma Kid: It's the halfway point of bluefin tuna fishing season in North Carolina's Outer Banks, and for the fishermen chasing big paydays, it's a race against time. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Love Is A Crazy Carnival Ride: Join heavy-duty movers as they transport weird, delicate and cumbersome items across the country. Dusty hits the road with a huge cow skull. (S6, ep 1)

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: To The Moon And Back: Join heavy-duty movers as they transport weird, delicate and cumbersome items. Jenn has a tricky time shipping moon rocks from Houston to Phoenix. (S6, ep 2)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lets Give Em Something To Tonka About: It's a long way to Murietta, and Dave is counting on his competition being unwilling to buy a big locker they need to move. (S12, ep 1)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Fowl Play: The buyers head to Torrance, where Dave sees his profits grow - amongst other things. Mary finds clothes that don't fit her, which turns out to be a good thing. (S12, ep 2)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: What Came First: The Chicken Or The Auction?: Overwhelmed by the sheer number of units up for auction in Rialto, Mary and Ivy wager that each can better predict locker prices. (S12, ep 3)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: A Sale Of Two Cities: Emily brings her mother along with her to Walnut, and Darrell wastes no time finding an advantage. Ivy and Ivy jr clean up with their locker. (S12, ep 4)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Wind Beneath My Birds: 30mph winds batter Desert Hot Springs, and the buyers do their best to keep standing. Rene and Gunther dust off an old locker. (S12, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Not All That Glitters Is Gourd: Back in the city of Orange, the Vegas Ladies arrive in vintage style - though not everyone agrees. (S12, ep 6)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mistress Of The Snark: Ivy thinks he's a comedian, but the gizmo in his locker is no joke. Brandi and Jarrod make sure that what they find in their unit doesn't stay there. (S12, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Drama In The LBC: North Long Beach doesn't really bring out the best in the buyers, though they do manage to make a charitable contribution. (S12, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Man In Black Is Back... In Black: Dave Hester shocks the others when he returns to the auctions with vengeance. But can he stop them from buying up the best units? (S7, ep 1)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Return Of The Mogul's Return: Even a fight with Laura can't keep Dave away from locker auctions in Montclair. Plus, how will Jarrod's hangover affect his bidding? (S7, ep 2)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Forged by the Gods: Examining otherworldly artefacts as physical evidence of extraterrestrial visits, including a strange metal sphere that defies the laws of physics. (S10, ep 2)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Mystery of Rudloe Manor: In the countryside of Wiltshire, England lies Rudloe Manor. A quaint manor house? Or epicentre of British UFO research since World War II? (S10, ep 1)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Alien Architects: Why do many ancient architectural wonders bear similarities despite being built by different civilisations? Could aliens have designed them? (S10, ep 3)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Pharoahs' Curse: Could a curse really exist on Tutankhamun's tomb, but in the form of alien technology designed to protect an incredible secret about our past? (S10, ep 4)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Science Wars: Examining claims that extraordinary discoveries are being ignored by the scientific community for not conforming to their accepted paradigm. (S10, ep 5)

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera
programme.desc: World's Most Haunted School & More: Cameras capture chilling poltergeist activity in a school in Ireland. Plus, two Russians spot Sasquatch in Siberia. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: New: Slender Man
programme.desc: In May 2014, three 12-year-old girls went into the woods in Wisconsin. Only two came out. The subsequent murder trial captivated the world. This documentary heads inside the verdict.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera
programme.desc: The Seedy Texas Motel Poltergeist & More: A businessman encounters a poltergeist in his hotel room. Plus, UFO is seen above one of the holiest sites on Earth. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: American Haunting
programme.desc: McGlones: The McGlones' dream home is becoming a nightmare as the family experience frightening paranormal activity on a daily basis. (1 of 3)

programme.title: American Haunting
programme.desc: McGlones: The McGlones' dream home is becoming a nightmare as the family experience frightening paranormal activity on a daily basis. (1 of 3)

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Mega Hog: Do wild hogs in the US grow to monstrous sizes? Many think so. But are these creatures fattened up in a pen, or is there another way they have reached gigantic proportions?

programme.title: Stan Lee's Superhumans
programme.desc: Hammer Head: Meet an ultramarathon runner, a man rumoured to have an indestructible head and a man who believes his dreams reveal the future. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Fool's Gold: Les causes drama when he tells a woman her gold bracelet is fake. Later, it's Seth's turn to suss whether a gold watch is priceless or worthless. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Cash Kings: An out-of-character Les makes an impulse decision that threatens to backfire, and later gives a big loan to a customer with a dubious sob story. Has he been fleeced? (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Whack Job: The staff are pushed to their breaking point by a customer's endless parade of worthless items. Later, Ashley gets the chance to assert herself. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: The Gold family and their employees are ready to haggle as members of the public continue to bring in their unique items in hope of raising some cash. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Acid Test: While Seth mulls over an expensive purchase that could save the store thousands, a customer attempts to sell a coat allegedly made of rare monkey fur. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Gold War: While Seth struggles through a tense customer interaction, Les has his hands full with a tough negotiation over a vintage gumball machine. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Family Feud: A difference of opinion threatens to explode into a full-on family feud on a difficult day in the shop. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Escape to the Wild Special: Tom Oar, Marty Meierotto, and Eustace Conway reveal what it takes to answer the call of the wild and tell the untold stories of their first winter.

programme.title: Mountain Men: Man Vs Winter
programme.desc: Season after season, the mountain men are locked in an endless battle against winter: the most dangerous predator of them all. (S5, ep 17)

programme.title: Alaska: Mysteries Unsolved
programme.desc: Vanished in a Vortex: In 1950, a military transport plane vanished in the Alaska Triangle with 44 people on board. Could a space-time vortex be the reason why? (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Bigfoot Files
programme.desc: Yeti: Oxford professor Bryan Sykes and presenter Mark Evans head out - armed with cutting-edge technology - to try and answer, once and for all, the great mystery of Bigfoot. (1 of 3)

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside...
programme.desc: ...America's UFO Investigation. UFOs In Combat: Everything we know about UFOs has changed. The all-star team return to explore new developments and investigations. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside...
programme.desc: ...America's UFO Investigation. Planetary Threat: Lue Elizondo uncovers an exclusive video, sparking an investigation into a possible threat posed by UFOs to our planet. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: The Search For The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Without a Trace: A crack team investigate the mysteries surrounding the life and work of Nikola Tesla, and hunt for files said to have been confiscated by the US government. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: The Search For The Tesla Files
programme.desc: The Colorado Experiment: The team heads to Colorado Springs to search for the remains of Nikola Tesla's mysterious laboratory. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: New: Walking Through History
programme.desc: Frontline Dorset: Tony Robinson winds back the clock to 1940 for a walk along Dorset's Jurassic Coast, revealing the county's World War II role as the frontline against Hitler. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: New: Walking Through History
programme.desc: The Birth of Industry: Tony heads out on a 40-mile walk through the wild, dramatic and romantic Peak District - the place where the Industrial Revolution began. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: New: Walking Through History
programme.desc: The Tudor Way: Tony Robinson takes a 45-mile hike through the beautiful countryside of the Weald in Kent and East Sussex, discovering its rich and surprising Tudor heritage. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: New: Walking Through History
programme.desc: Battle In The Glens: Tony takes a tough four-day trek through the Kintail region of the Highlands to discover the incredible story of the Jacobite Uprisings of the early 1700s. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: New: Walking Through History
programme.desc: The Path To Stonehenge: Walking from the stone circles of Avebury to Stonehenge, Tony explores the connections between Europe's finest collection of Neolithic monuments. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld
programme.desc: Catacombs Of Death (Paris): Crypts, ancient waterfronts, waste-filled sewers, and hundreds of miles of limestone tunnels snake beneath Paris. Eric Geller examines its underworld. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: Cask and You Shall Receive: Excitement grows when the team discovers evidence of wooden casks on the mysterious stone roadway. (S8, ep 15)

programme.title: New: Wicked Tuna: Outer Banks
programme.desc: New. Old Sailors and Bold Sailors: It's winter in the Outer Banks, and dangerous conditions at sea force every captain to decide whether to play it safe or risk it all. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: New: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Freedom: As winter descends on the mountains, Jake's first lion hunt ends in a near-deadly dust-up, while Tom and Nancy face a surge in the local coyote population. (S9, ep 1)

programme.title: New: Mountain Men

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: The Ties that Bind. Second-time bride Elizabeth hopes dress shopping with her mum will convince her to attend her wedding. Rachel's low budget threatens her dream dress vision. S7, Ep16

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Good Things Come to Those Who Wait. With only months to go until her big day, June is under pressure to find a gown. In for her fitting, bride Hillary hopes for her dad's approval. S7, Ep17

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Curves and Curveballs. Zelda must win over her family after revealing she got engaged over the phone and hasn't seen her fiancé in 12 years. Plus, bride Emma needs a smaller gown. S7, Ep18

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Double Brides, Double Trouble. Best friend brides Jenaya and Terinni both fall in love with the same dress, and brides Lex and Amy keep their gowns secret from each other. S8, Ep1

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Atlanta
programme.desc: Bridal Highs And Woes. At over 6 ft tall, shopping is tough for Stacy, but so is her Mum. After trying on over 80 wedding gowns to date, Taylor just cannot make up her mind. S8, Ep2

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Chinese New Year. Continuing to fill her empty nest with new activities, Theresa decides to investigate and celebrate Chinese New Year for the first time. S5, Ep6

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Medium Love. This year, Theresa decides she will take control over her and Larry's Valentine's Day plans, but will unanticipated forces ruin the entire evening for them? S5, Ep7

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Theresa Visits Jail. Theresa is so touched reading a woman whose son passed away in jail, she decides to do a group reading in a prison and connects a woman with her family. S5, Ep8

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Out of the Attic. It's spring cleaning time in the Caputo household, but Theresa can't seem to let anything go. And later, Theresa shocks a woman during a reading. S5, Ep9

programme.title: Evil Online
programme.desc: Internet Casanova. Single mum Jenn thinks she's found the man of her dreams on a dating site, but little does she know Ray Holycross is a sociopath who preys on vulnerable women. S1, Ep4

programme.title: New: A Deadly Dose
programme.desc: The alleged suicide of Las Vegas attorney Susan Winters is investigated further after her parents raise suspicion about the victim's husband. Could it be murder?

programme.title: New: A Deadly Dose
programme.desc: The alleged suicide of Las Vegas attorney Susan Winters is investigated further after her parents raise suspicion about the victim's husband. Could it be murder?

programme.title: Faking It
programme.desc: Nathan Matthews & Shauna Hoare. When 16-year-old Becky Watts vanished without trace suspicions fell on her step-brother and his partner. Experts analyse police interviews for clues. S3, Ep8

programme.title: Murder On CCTV
programme.desc: Vanished At Noon. In 2014, Jessica Padgett disappears. Surveillance cameras show her driving into a parking lot and walking down an alley, never to return. What happened to her? S3, Ep4

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: Mom Makes Four. When Carla Fuqua vanishes after a night out with friends, her family panics. Even worse, Carla has become the fourth missing person in a town of less than 5,000. S3, Ep5

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: Deadly Takeover. Two gunmen rob a Seattle bank. One of the gunmen is killed in a firefight with police, while the other escapes after assaulting a family. Can he be caught? S6, Ep6

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Helping the Helpless. Investigator Sage Halford seizes some possible fighting pit-bulls and later tackles their owner in court. Will it lead to a conviction? S11, Ep9

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Owners Lisa and Callu are worried about Merlin, a Great Dane who goes over on his front toes when he walks. Neurologist Annette Wessman suspects a problem in his spine or skull. S1, Ep10

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Randy Knows Best
programme.desc: Top 10 Most Outrageous Bridal Requests. Randy looks back at larger-than-life brides, their outlandish dresses and how the salon dealt with over the top demands. S1, Ep8

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress: The Big Day
programme.desc: Kristi. Former pro-cheerleader Kristi has only one vision for her wedding day - her own. But she must find a way to let go if she ever wants to make it down the aisle. S2, Ep3

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Cats in Trouble. When it becomes apparent that a group of cats are in peril, the investigators from the Houston Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals swoop into action. S14, Ep16

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Wild Cats. Follow the work of the Houston Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals as they tackle cases of cruelty and neglect, and promote animal welfare. S14, Ep17

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Kelly's Story. Kelly inherited her love of food from her obese mum. After a personal tragedy her weight ballooned to over 700-lb and she is on the verge of immobility. S7, Ep13

programme.title: My 600-lb Life: Where Are...
programme.desc: ...They Now? Maja And Justin. Maja needs weight loss surgery, but an upsetting breakup could derail her plans. And, Justin charts a course to be one of Dr. Now's best patients ever. S6, Ep1

programme.title: My Extreme Excess Skin
programme.desc: Sarah & Roger. Sarah comfort-ate during her damaging childhood, but her 220-lb weight loss left her with painful sagging skin. Roger's 300-lb weight loss left him feeling restricted. S2, Ep7

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: A Very Merry Wedding. Stephanie wants to kick off Christmas with a Black Friday wedding. Meanwhile, Katie is hoping to look like an ice princess for her winter wonderland wedding. S9, Ep9

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Big Entourage, Bigger Opinions. The red carpet is being rolled out for the premiere episode and with a celebrity in the salon - there is no shortage of attitude! S9, Ep10

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Grands Know Best. Bride Nicole shops with the help of her psychic Aunt, Desiree consults her 90-year-old Grandma and Allyson tries to match a 100-year-old veil with her modern gown. S9, Ep11

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Dare to be Different. Randi is having a carnival wedding and wants a polka dot gown, opera singer Mary wants a dress to match her personality, and Boo & Piper have a doggie wedding. S9, Ep12

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Queen for the Day. Nicole leaves her young quadruplets at home while she shops and cancer sufferer Margo wants a perfect dress to make her feel beautiful. S9, Ep13

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Love the Skin I'm In. Heather is looking for a dramatic gown that doesn't accentuate her hips, and body conscious Kristyn has been avoiding wedding dress shopping for a year. S9, Ep14

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Day of Challenges. Shari looks for a vow renewal dress with her picky hubby, bride-to-be Alex must find a gown in twenty-four hours and new bride Ebony is nervous for a fitting. S9, Ep15

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: It's Just Money. Kandice comes from Texas to find a blingy, dress for her vow renewals and bride Barbara wants a sexy gown with sparkle to match her killer stilettos. S9, Ep16

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: It Ain't Easy Being Me. When Larry gets upset with Theresa's spending habits, the two of them decide to trade lives for a day. And, Theresa connects a young woman with her mother. S5, Ep10

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: The Show Must Go on. Theresa does a reading for charity, at a historic New York theatre, to help its doors stay open. Plus, a woman reconnects with her father who died tragically. S5, Ep11

programme.title: Long Island Medium
programme.desc: Prayers for Petey. The Caputo family has some tough decisions to make, as the health of their beloved dog, Petey, starts to decline. While at the vets, Theresa works her magic. S5, Ep12

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Ryan's Journey. Ryan has lost his job and spends most of his time on a large recliner. He is determined not to suffer the same fate as his father, who died weighing 800 pounds. S9, Ep8

programme.desc: From Hell's Canyon to Ernest Hemingway's haven and from the world's first atomic city to the birth of the potato boom, fly above a breathtaking state with a past as rich as its volcanic soil.

programme.title: Aerial America
programme.desc: An aerial tour over Kentucky, the bluegrass state and home of the Kentucky Derby. This stunningly beautiful state was the birthplace of Abe Lincoln, and where Scottish settlers distilled bourbon.

programme.title: Aerial America
programme.desc: Utah's fascinating history ranges from the cannibalism of the Donner Party to the growth of Mormonism into a world religion. (S1, E41)

programme.title: Inside The Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace is in Burton on Trent at Britain's biggest brewery. It produces 3 million pints a day and has a machine that fills 165 cans in 5.5 secs. Cherry Healey shows the secret of a perfect pint.

programme.title: United States of Drinking
programme.desc: The science, the inventions, and the long history of alcohol in America.

programme.title: Private Lives of the Windsors

programme.title: Private Lives of the Windsors
programme.desc: Princess Margaret. She was a beauty who lived a lavish but troubled life in the shadow of a Queen, and in the headlines of newspapers. She burned much of her correspondence, but love letters remain.

programme.title: Private Lives of the Windsors
programme.desc: The Queen Mother: For over fifty years she was Britain's grandmother - always in a flowery hat, always smiling, and a patron of good causes. She was also a self-created star with a steel backbone.

programme.title: Britain in Colour

programme.title: Britain in Colour

programme.title: The Trial
programme.desc: 1962. Mystery. Directed by Orson Welles. Stars Anthony Perkins, Romy Schneider & Orson Welles. An office worker is arrested and whilst standing trial he is never made aware of the charges against him.

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline introduces the last offering - Shadows of Fear, At Occupiers Risk. The episode focuses on a young woman being the only guest at a strange hotel, starring Anthony Bate & Annette Crosbie.

programme.title: Shadows of Fear
programme.desc: At Occupiers Risk. 1971. Stars: Anthony Bate, Annette Crosbie, Gemma Jones. When a young woman turns up at a strange Hotel, she notices she's the only guest (S1, E03)

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline ends another great evening of horror, mystery and drama with a sneak peek of next week's films.

programme.title: Money Movers
programme.desc: 1978. Crime. Director: Bruce Beresford. Stars: Terence Donovan, Bryan Brown and Tony Bonner. A company running armoured cars has to tighten security after being targeted by robbers.

programme.title: Woman Eater
programme.desc: 1958. Sci-Fi. Directed By Charles Saunders. Stars George Coulouris & Vera Day. A mad scientist captures women and feeds them to a flesh eating tree.

programme.title: Hey, Jeannie!
programme.desc: Jeannie meets Chief Mike Flying Eagle. She wants to help him to start the rain season. (S2, E06)

programme.title: Grand Ole Opry
programme.desc: 1940. Comedy. Directed by Frank McDonald. A small-town mayor in the Ozarks, passes a bill to help farmers and wins the election for state government through music of the Grand Ole Opry.

programme.title: Welcome, Mr. Washington
programme.desc: 1944. Drama. Directed by Leslie S. Hiscott. Stars Barbara Mullen, Donald Stewart & Peggy Cummins. Two sisters are forced to lease their estate as an airbase to American forces during WW2.

programme.title: Look At Life Cinema Steps Out
programme.desc: 1960. A look cinema and its evolution regarding comfort and the different types of films that draw audiences in.

programme.title: Hawkeye & the Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Snake Tattoo. 1957. Directed by Sam Newfield. Stars John Hart, Lon Chaney Jr & Daryl Masters. Hawkeye and Chingachcook set out to help a young Native American.

programme.title: Young Eagles
programme.desc: Drums of Hate. Made For Cinema audiences in 1934. A 12 part Boys own adventure with the scouts. In this episode the boys meet the other inhabitants of the island, will they be friend or foe?

programme.title: Sammy's Super T-Shirt
programme.desc: 1978. Comedy. Directed by Jeremy Summers. Stars Reggie Winch, Lawrie Mark & Richard Vernon. Children's Film Foundation. A little boy stands up to his tormentors via the device of a magical T-shirt.

programme.title: The Barnstormers
programme.desc: Camberley's Quest. 1964. Stars Dennis Waterman, Peter Hempson, Tina Martin & John Pike. The mystery surrounding the casket grows deeper, as the children's play begins to take shape.

programme.title: Watch Out
programme.desc: 1953. Family. Directed by Don Chaffey. Stars Peter Butterworth, Humphrey Kent & Harry Lane. Dickie Duffle finds himself in trouble whilst touring a film studio.

programme.title: Dark City
programme.desc: 1950. Thriller. Directed by William Dieterle. Stars: Charlton Heston, Dean Jagger, Lizabeth Scott, Viveca Lindfors. When a man kills himself after a poker game, his brother looks for revenge.

programme.title: The Iron Maiden
programme.desc: 1962. Comedy. Directed by Gerald Thomas. Starring Michael Craig & Joan Sims. An aircraft designer with a passion for traction engines, designs a new supersonic jet plane to sell to America.

programme.title: She
programme.desc: 1965. Adventure. Director: Robert Day. Stars Ursula Andress, John Richardson, Peter Cushing & Christopher Lee. Archaeologists stumble across a lost city, run by a beautiful immortal Queen.

programme.title: King of The Khyber Rifles
programme.desc: 1953. Adventure. Directed by Henry King. Stars Tyrone Power, Terry Moore & Michael Rennie. A British officer in 19th century India faces prejudice from all sides while trying to quell a rebellion.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Murder in Montmartre. 1960. Stars Rupert Davies, Freda Jackson & Ewen Solon. Maigret investigates the murder of a stripper, finding himself mixing with the low life types of Montmartre.

programme.title: The Green Man
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy. Stars Alastair Sim, Raymond Huntley, George Cole & Terry-Thomas. A watchmaker turns out to be an assassin whose target is a leading politician but his plans are stalled.

programme.title: Spanish Fly
programme.desc: 1976. Comedy. Director: Bob Kellett. Stars: Leslie Phillips, Terry-Thomas, Graham Armitage. A businessman is trying to shoot an ad for his company's new line of lingerie when he encounters a rival.

programme.title: Spanish Fly
programme.desc: 1976. Comedy. Director: Bob Kellett. Stars: Leslie Phillips, Terry-Thomas, Graham Armitage. A businessman is trying to shoot an ad for his company's new line of lingerie when he encounters a rival.

programme.title: New Kind of Love
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Directed by Melville Shavelson. Stars Paul Newman, Joanne Woodward, Thelma Ritter. A womanising American reporter in Paris mistakes a fashion designer for a high-class prostitute

programme.title: The Reptile
programme.desc: 1966. Horror. Director: John Gilling. Star: Noel Willman, Jennifer Daniel, Ray Barrett, Jacqueline Pearce. A deadly epidemic is spreading through the remote Cornish village of Clagmoor Heath.

programme.title: A Chump At Oxford
programme.desc: 1940. Comedy. Director: Alfred J. Goulding. Stars Stan Laurel, Oliver Hardy, James Finlayson & Peter Cushing. A bank pays for Stan & Ollie's education at Oxford after they catch a bank robber.

programme.title: Honey West
programme.desc: 1965. Invitation To Limbo. Crime series produced by Aaron Spelling & stars Anne Francis. An electronics firm hires Honey to find an industrial spy who has been leaking company secrets.

programme.title: Spare a Copper
programme.desc: 1940. Comedy. Directed by John Paddy Carstairs. Stars George Formby, Dorothy Hyson, George Merritt. A War Reserve Policeman foils saboteurs plotting to destroy a warship.

programme.title: Kiss the Bride Goodbye
programme.desc: 1944. Joan's (Patricia Medina) mother wants her to marry her pompous boss although she loves a soldier (Jimmy Hanley). One of Jean Simmon's first films.

programme.title: Look At Life And So To Bed
programme.desc: 1960. A focus on sleep and the best methods to get it. Also, with a look at beds, mattresses and how they have changed over time.

programme.title: Law Of The Plainsman
programme.desc: 1960. Jeb's Daughter. Sam Buckhart was an Apache who had saved the life of a U.S. officer. When the officer died, he left Sam money that he put towards his education.

programme.title: This England
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. Directed by David MacDonald. Stars Emlyn Williams, John Clements & Roddy McDowall. A country squire tells a US journalist the tradition of English freedom through a village's history.

programme.title: Sabotage At Sea
programme.desc: 1943. Drama. Directed by Leslie S. Hiscott. Stars Jane Carr, Felix Aylme. The captain of a British cargo ship shanghais saboteurs, unaware that the daughter of the ship's owner is among them.

programme.title: Nickelodeon
programme.desc: 1977. Comedy. Directed by Peter Bogdanovich. Stars Ryan O'Neal, Burt Reynolds & Tatum O'Neal. It's 1910 and a new form of entertainment is growing in popularity - the nickelodeon moving pictures!

programme.title: IWM: They Stand Ready (1955)
programme.desc: 1955. A documentary that offers a robust justification of National Service at a time when large numbers of British troops were stationed in the Mediterranean & the Far East as well as in West Germany

programme.title: Love is a Many-Splendored Thing
programme.desc: 1955. Romantic drama. Directed by Henry King. Stars William Holden, Jennifer Jones & Torin Thatcher. A widowed Chinese-English doctor falls in love with a married American reporter in 1949 Hong Kong.

programme.title: Upstairs Downstairs
programme.desc: Disillusion. 1975. Stars Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh & Angela Baddeley. The revelation of Hudson's secret relationship brings about a series of unexpected events for everyone in the household.

programme.title: Halfway House
programme.desc: 1944. Drama. Directed by Basil Dearden. Starring Mervyn Johns, Glynis Johns & Tom Walls. A group of travellers, all with something to hide in their past, take shelter from a storm in an old inn.

programme.title: Secret Army
programme.desc: Be the First Kid in Your Block to Rule the World. 1977. Stars Bernard Hepton, Jan Francis & Angela Richards. Lt. Curtis's cover is blown, the city is surrounded, and he must think quickly to escape.

programme.title: Ooh - You Are Awful
programme.desc: 1972. Comedy. Directed by Cliff Owen. Stars Dick Emery, Derren Nesbitt, Ronald Fraser, Cheryl Kennedy, Pat Coombs & Liza Goddard. Charlie must find a bank account number to recover a fortune.

programme.title: Lilybuds
